name: newmtgsdk
description: Magic: The Gathering SDK is a javascript wrapper around the MTG API located at magicthegathering.io
author: Raine Revere <raineorshine@gmail.com> (https://github.com/metaraine)

scripts.build: standard "*src/**/*.js" && babel src -s -d lib && babel test-src -s -d test && npm run test
scripts.watch: nodemon -w src -w test-src -x npm run build
